headline: Aquarian Nears Deal for U.S. Insurer Brighthouse
summary: Investment firm Aquarian Holdings is in exclusive talks to acquire the U.S. life insurance company  Brighthouse Financial  according to people familiar with the matter.  It would mark the end of a competitive process for Brighthouse, which has drawn interest from a number of other big private-equity firms.  Brighthouse, which was spun out of  MetLife  in 2017, is one of the biggest providers of annuities and life insurance in the U.S.
